title: If you’ve lost a massive bag of dildos they’ve been found in Somerset
text:
They were ditched up the back passage of a Natwest in Bridgwater (Picture: Richard Lees)

Residents in a town in Somerset have been left shaken after a bag of sex toys was discovered dumped at the side of the road.

There was a buzz about the town of Bridgwater as people tried to work out who they belonged to.

There is rampant speculation around the town about the pink and purple dildos that were left next to a drain up the rear passage of a branch of Natwest.

Richard Lees took a picture of the abandoned sex toys but nobody has cum forward to admit to owning them.

There were up to 10 vibrators discovered among the haul, varying in size. It is not known if they have been used or still work.

On the local newspaper Facebook page, people seemed more bothered about the quality of the paper bag or cardboard box that used to contain the sex toys.
